package.name: Redsn0w Respring Logo
package.shortDescription: Redsn0w pinapple boot logo for resprings!

descriptionlist.description: This is a the redsn0w pinapple boot logo as a respring logo. Apply with Anemone. iOS >=10.0 requires MakeRespringsGreatAgain.

The following respring logos are included:
- Installing logo (Running Pineapple)
- Pwnapple Color (the classic boot logo)
- Pwnapple (the silver version of Pwnapple Color)
